scripts.dev: nodemon --watch 'src/**' --ext 'ts,json' --exec 'npm run build && npm run start'
scripts.scale:workers: concurrently "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single"  "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single" "npm run worker:single"
scripts.dev:full: npm run rabbit && concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run scale:workers"
